main event: A round unidentified object was observed in Parkland, Maryland on 20 Aug 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 30 minutes.,It appeared to be of metallic construction and was half the size of a fighter aircraft.,The object moved slowly in a straight line and revolved slightly.,The sighting was evaluated as probably a balloon release.,Witness observation included three members of the same family.
witness description: Mr. J and three members of his immediate family.
